comment: I always find it funny when people who run around warning everyone to "Mute the Nazis" turn around and talk about us being in an echo chamber.

comment: Your avatar is a vile and evil reminder that men murdered human beings and used their skin like animal leather to adorn their domiciles. You are trapped in another kind of echo chamber. And now you are muted as well. Evil cannot be placed at the head of the table. Hate is evil.
